name: NSDatePicker
desc: A display of a calendar date with controls for editing the date value.

items.name: var isBezeled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the date picker draws a bezeled border.

items.name: var isBordered: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the date picker has a plain border.

items.name: var backgroundColor: NSColor
items.desc: The date picker’s background color.

items.name: var drawsBackground: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the date picker draws the background.

items.name: var textColor: NSColor
items.desc: The date picker’s text color.

items.name: var datePickerStyle: NSDatePicker.Style
items.desc: The date picker’s style.

items.name: var presentsCalendarOverlay: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to present a graphical calendar overlay when editing a calendar element within a text-field style date picker.

items.name: var delegate: NSDatePickerCellDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate for the date picker’s cell

items.name: var datePickerElements: NSDatePicker.ElementFlags
items.desc: A bitmask that indicates which visual elements of the date picker are currently shown, and which won't be usable because they are hidden.

items.name: struct NSDatePicker.ElementFlags
items.desc: Constants that specify the date and time elements displayed by the picker.

items.name: enum NSDatePicker.Style
items.desc: Constants that define the visual appearance of the date picker cell.

items.name: var calendar: Calendar?
items.desc: The calendar used by the date picker.

items.name: var locale: Locale?
items.desc: The date picker’s locale.

items.name: var datePickerMode: NSDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: The date picker’s mode.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone for the date picker.

items.name: enum NSDatePicker.Mode
items.desc: Constants that define whether the picker provides a single date, or a range of dates.

items.name: var dateValue: Date
items.desc: The date selected by the date picker.

items.name: var timeInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time interval selected by the date picker.

items.name: var minDate: Date?
items.desc: The date picker’s minimum date value.

items.name: var maxDate: Date?
items.desc: The date picker’s maximum date value.
